title: Mood log
description: Each entry records a subjective assessment of a person's mood at specific time.

calendar_date_id.description: YYYYMMDD formatted date of data entry.

timestamp.description: HH:MM:SS formatted time of data entry.

person_id.description: the person whose mood is being assessed

feeling_great.description: Commentary regarding how the person is feeling on this date and time.

how_are_you_doing_score.description: sentiment score assigned to answer to question - how are you doing?
